name: Vector Geometry Wars
description:
Get in your vector ship and destroy endless waves of geometry shapes!

Play for the highscore in this fast action twin shooter.

Fight through endless waves of vector geometry shapes each harder, and with different AI, than the next.

There are 4 different difficulties, each spawning enemies faster and faster with more health than the last.

Each life you can work your way up to 5 way bullet shots by getting a certain number of points during that life. Don't die or you start all over!

Features:

Neat Vector Geometry Glowing Graphics

Flashy particle explosion effects

Per Life Upgradable Weapons

Twin Shooter Controls

Kill some time with this classic flashy geometry shooter!
